name: Music_4102.wav
keywords: ['wide vibrato synthesizer', 'full ensemble melody', 'string bass ensemble', 'fearful male muttering', 'video game music', 'lurching', 'creeping', 'spooky']
caption: A synthesizer holds a note with increasingly wide vibrato then joins the string bass ensemble in playing a lurching, creeping melody. Sounds like music from a spooky video game. Fearful male muttering can also be heard.
